trait.name: Living Shadow
entries: While in {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} or {@variantrule Darkness|XPHB}, the dragon has {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to damage that isn't Force, Psychic, or Radiant.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the dragon has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on ability checks and attack rolls.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes two Rend attacks.

action.name: Rend
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 10 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) Slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Necrotic damage.

action.name: Shadow Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 13}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 17 ({@damage 5d6}) Necrotic damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} A Humanoid reduced to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} by this damage dies, and a {@creature Shadow|XMM} rises from its corpse. The shadow is under the dragon's control and shares the dragon's {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB} count but acts immediately after the dragon.
